Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /
Chapter 3 - ColorSync Manager Reference for Applications and Device Drivers / Constants and Data Types
Color Values

RGB Color Value

A color value expressed in the RGB color space is composed of red, green, and blue component values. Each color component is expressed as a numeric value within the range of 0 to 65535.

struct CMRGBColor {
   unsigned shortred;   
   unsigned shortgreen; 
   unsigned shortblue;
};
